name: Market Lot
description: The Mid-Market neighborhood is in the north eastern corner of SoMa. Most notably, Twitter moved into the neighborhood during its early days. Other major companies found within Mid-Market includes Uber, Dolby and Square.

name: 14 Colton St
description: The huge parking lot next to the cruise ship terminal doesn't seem to fill up much and the prices are reasonable.

name: Opera Plaza
description: This facility offers only self-parking, no valet service.

name: 530 Turk St
desciption: Parking is available 6AM to 7PM, Monday to Friday. This facility offers only self-parking, no valet service. There is no overnight parking nor weekend/holiday parking available.

name: 7th & Pacific Lot
description: Parking is available 24 hours daily, 7 days a week including holidays to the general public. Outdoor lot, self-park (attended).
